settings.Reset Confirmation Message: Are you sure you want to reset all settings? This will restore default values for temperature, theme, and other preferences. Your conversations, prompts, and tones will not be affected.
settings.storageAlmostFull: Storage almost full! Consider clearing old conversations.
settings.backupDescription: Create a complete backup of all your data including conversations, prompts, tones, folders, and settings.
settings.clearDataWarning: Delete all conversation history from local storage. This cannot be undone.
settings.teamTemplatesDescription: Package your prompts, tones, folders, and custom agents into a shareable file that other team members can import.
settings.Scan this QR code with your mobile devic: Scan this QR code with your mobile device to start the install process
settings.Access the app directly from your home s: Access the app directly from your home screen

settings.PWA Install Tip: üí° Tip: Once installed, you can launch the app from your home screen just like a regular app - no browser needed!
settings.PWA Note: Note: This is a Progressive Web App (PWA). It installs like a native app but runs through your browser's technology. All your data stays private and secure on your device.
settings.Learn more about Progressive Web Apps: Learn more about Progressive Web Apps

gpt-4-1.description: AI model powered by GPT-4.1 with real-time web search via Bing. Provides up-to-date information, fact-checking, and current events awareness. Best for research requiring recent information, news analysis, and fact verification.

gpt-5.description: OpenAI's most advanced model, excelling in complex reasoning, code generation, and technical problem-solving. Best for analytical tasks, coding challenges, research, and detailed explanations. Supports adjustable reasoning effort and response verbosity.

gpt-5-mini.description: Faster and more cost-effective variant of GPT-5, optimized for speed while maintaining high quality. Ideal for everyday tasks, quick queries, tool steering, and applications requiring fast response times. Excellent balance of performance and efficiency.

gpt-5-chat.description: Specialized variant of GPT-5 optimized for conversational interactions and emotional intelligence. Excels in empathetic communication, mental health support, creative writing, brainstorming, and natural dialogue. Best for casual conversations, counseling scenarios, and tasks requiring emotional awareness.

o3.description: OpenAI's most advanced reasoning model with breakthrough problem-solving capabilities. Excels in complex mathematics, scientific reasoning, coding challenges, and multi-step logical tasks. Extended 200K context window. Supports reasoning effort control.

Llama-4-Maverick-17B-128E-Instruct-FP8.description: Fast and cost-effective model from Meta. Great for everyday tasks like writing, summarizing, and basic code assistance. Good balance of speed and quality for routine work.

DeepSeek-R1.description: Reasoning specialist that shows its work step-by-step. Excellent for math problems, logic puzzles, and understanding complex concepts. Watch it think through problems in real-time.

DeepSeek-V3-1.description: Strong all-around model particularly good at code and technical writing. Excellent for debugging code, writing documentation, and explaining technical concepts. Fast and reliable for development work.

grok-3.description: Versatile model from xAI known for detailed responses. Great for open-ended discussions, creative projects, and tackling complex problems.

ui.searchModeDescription: Will use web search when needed
ui.azureAIAgentModeDescription: Faster but stores conversation data in the cloud
ui.fullConversationSentWarning: Your full conversation will be sent to Azure AI Foundry agent.
ui.temperatureNote: Note: This model uses fixed temperature values for consistent performance.

advancedSettings.reasoningEffortDescription: Controls how much the model thinks before responding
advancedSettings.verbosityDescription: Controls how much detail the model provides
